author: wtopstaff
title: Warriors waive G Ben Gordon
text:
Home » News » Sports » NBA » Warriors waive G Ben Gordon Warriors waive G Ben Gordon By The Associated Press October 14, 2015 5:33 pm 
OAKLAND, Calif. (AP) — The Golden State Warriors have waived guard Ben Gordon. 
Gordon was brought into camp on a tryout basis last month but the Warriors decided to cut ties with him Wednesday. 
Gordon had two points and two assists in two exhibition games. 
The 32-year-old Gordon has averaged 14.9 points per game for his career and is a 40 percent shooter from 3-point range. Topics:
